com.observability.monitoring.daemon

Class DaemonHeartbeatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.observability.monitoring.daemon.DaemonHeartbeatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class DaemonHeartbeatClient
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.io.Serializable
    DaemonHeartbeatClient is a process that runs in the daemons.
    1. Periodically checks if measurements are being collected
    2. Periodically sends heart beat message to collectd server. The message depends on the outcome of step 1.
    Author:
    Prasanth Nair
    Created June 5 2015
    Joel Gao
    Modified Jun 19 2015
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean verifyLatestMetricMeasurement()
        Method to verify if a valid measurement is present in the CSV metric file.
        A measurement is valid if it is newer than the configured threshold.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if valid. False if not.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
